segments.text: What do you think a job means to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a way to make a living , but beyond this it's a way of fulfilling one's development . It can prove your ability .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask you why you left the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I left the job because of expiry of my employment contract . Besides I have accumulated a lot of experience in this sort of job . I want to seek better jobs .
segments.speaker: S2
